Mod.Name: Skin-RF
Mod.Author: Dulca + Slimebucket
Mod.Description:
New vesion 1.40 out now! More weapons have been added! Welcome Skin-RF back to the Catalog!
Kiros, Ward, Seifer, and Zell now have high defination weapons by Slimebucket!
Skin-RF -Enhance field models. Multiple Battle models to choose from for Playable characters with synchronized Field models.

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: Version 1.40 : More weapons added Version 1.31 : Cloudie McDoom Squall Costume added, minor fixes Version 1.21 : Minor bug fixes Version 1.20 : Slimebucket Weapon Pack for Squall added. Version 1.10 : Playable characters have a low poly synced field model. New Field models for All Playable characters. Synchrized world map model for Squall.
